data.title: Transfer news: Summer transfer window 2024 | Premier League ins and outs
data.meta_description: Keep up to date with all the latest news across the whole of the summer transfer window with the Transfer Centre blog on Sky Sports website and app, and on Sky Sports News
data.text:
The transfer window is open - and clubs are already signing players. Find out who is on the move across the Premier League...

Check below for a comprehensive list of all the Premier League ins and outs from the 2024 summer transfer window.

Keep track of all the latest developments with our Transfer Centre blog.

Transfer Centre LIVE! | Papers - latest headlines

Stream the Premier League and more with NOW

Get Sky Sports | Download the Sky Sports app

Fees include potential add-ons.
